column4: Hello! After updating to karmic, I seem to be missing the file FindCompiz.cmake. Isn't this file supposed to come as part of compiz? Should I reinstall compiz to get it back?
you will need to re-enable the universe repositories and reinstall compiz to get back to where you were
oh, ok. but universe is already enabled in my package sources
a simple sudo aptitude reinstall compiz did not have any noticable effect
